subject: Hockey, Ice
Playoff Games
Relocation of Business
lead_paragraph: With a move to Brooklyn in its future, the N.H.L.’s Long Island franchise is seeking its first postseason home victory since 2002, a year fans have not forgotten.
snippet: With a move to Brooklyn in its future, the N.H.L.’s Long Island franchise is seeking its first postseason home victory since 2002, a year fans have not forgotten.
